about_the_game:
Welcome to Turtle Races, a thrilling turn-based betting game where strategy and luck collide!

In Turtle Races, you place your bets on a variety of outcomes in a high-stakes turtle race. Predict which turtle will finish first, second, third, and fourth, or guess which turtles will make the most progress within a certain time. The excitement doesn’t stop there; stay alert for unexpected twists and turns that can change the race's outcome in an instant!

Key Features:

Turn-Based Betting: Strategically place your bets on different outcomes. Will your chosen turtle take the lead or make a surprising comeback?

Multiple Betting Options: Bet on the winning turtle, the runner-ups, or predict the order of finish. You can also wager on which turtles will show significant progress during the race.

Dynamic Races: Each race is filled with surprises and random events that can turn the tide, ensuring no two races are ever the same.

Exciting Mechanics: The game’s core mechanic is centered around betting and racing, providing a straightforward yet deeply engaging experience.

Thrilling Experience: Whether you’re a seasoned bettor or a curious newcomer, Turtle Races promises excitement and unexpected twists at every turn.

Get ready to place your bets and experience the thrill of the race. Will you walk away with the prize money, or will the turtles surprise you? Join the race now and find out!

name: Underground Turtle Races

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit

short_description: Are you ready to test your luck in the secret world of turtle racing? The turtles are waiting for you to place your bets and cheer them on. Do you have the confidence to take on the challenge?
